services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your social media strategy

analysis.title: Social Media Analysis
analysis.description: Get detailed insights into your social performance with our advanced analytics tools.
analysis.details: Our social media analysis service provides comprehensive reports on engagement rates, audience demographics, and content performance. We use cutting-edge AI to identify trends and growth opportunities.

contentStrategy.title: Content Strategy
contentStrategy.description: We develop tailored content strategies to maximize social media engagement.
contentStrategy.details: Our content strategy is designed to increase your brand visibility and generate meaningful interactions. We create comprehensive editorial plans based on analytical data and industry trends to ensure each post reaches its full potential.

communityManagement.title: Community Management
communityManagement.description: Build and manage an active, engaged community around your brand.
communityManagement.details: Our community management service focuses on creating authentic relationships with your audience. We handle daily interactions, respond to comments and questions, and implement strategies to increase user loyalty and turn them into brand ambassadors.

growthHacking.title: Growth Hacking
growthHacking.description: Accelerate your social presence growth with innovative data-driven techniques.
growthHacking.details: Our approach to growth hacking combines creativity, data analysis, and automation to achieve rapid and sustainable growth. We use agile methodologies to test different strategies, optimize the most effective ones, and scale results across all social platforms.

socialAutomation.title: Social Automation
socialAutomation.description: Automate repetitive processes and focus on creative strategy.
socialAutomation.details: Our social automation solution saves you valuable time by automating repetitive tasks such as post scheduling, standard responses, and monitoring. We use advanced tools and custom workflows to maintain a consistent social media presence without sacrificing authenticity.

globalBrand.title: Global Brand Presence
globalBrand.description: Expand your brand presence internationally with localized strategies.
globalBrand.details: Our global brand presence service helps you reach an international audience while maintaining your brand consistency. We create multilingual and multicultural strategies that respect local specificities while maintaining your brand's global identity.

advertising.title: Social Advertising
advertising.description: Optimize your ROI with targeted, data-driven social ad campaigns.
advertising.details: Our team of social advertising experts creates and optimizes campaigns that maximize return on investment. We use advanced targeting, engaging creatives, and continuous testing to ensure every dollar spent generates tangible results for your business.

contentProduction.title: Content Production
contentProduction.description: We produce high-quality visual and textual content optimized for each platform.
contentProduction.details: Our content production service handles the creation of professional content for all social platforms. From copywriting to graphics, videos to animations, each element is specifically designed to maximize engagement on the target platform.

influencerMarketing.title: Influencer Marketing
influencerMarketing.description: Collaborate with strategically selected influencers to amplify your message.
influencerMarketing.details: Our influencer marketing service identifies and manages collaborations with creators who perfectly align with your brand values. We develop authentic campaigns that leverage influencers' credibility to increase visibility and trust in your brand.

services.chartSubtitle: Average results based on data from the last 6 months

simulator.title: Engagement Simulator
simulator.subtitle: Measure, analyze and optimize your social media performance

metrics.postsPerMonth: Number of posts in the last month

importance.title: Why is it important?
importance.description: Shares and saves are high-quality engagement indicators. According to recent research, these signals carry more weight in {platform} algorithms and can significantly influence the organic visibility of your content.

results.title: Analysis Result

veryLow.general: Your engagement rate is significantly below the industry average. It's time to completely revise your social strategy.
actions: Analyze when your audience is most active and post during those times
Ask direct questions in your posts to stimulate interactions
Review your communication tone to make it more engaging
Consider using interactive content such as polls and quizzes

low.general: Your engagement rate is below average. There's good room for improvement with some strategic adjustments.
actions: Experiment with different content formats to see what resonates best
Increase the frequency of responses to follower comments
Use stronger call-to-actions in your posts
Implement a more targeted and relevant hashtag strategy

average.general: Your engagement rate is in line with the industry average. You're doing a good job, but there's room for further improvements.
actions: Identify your best-performing posts and create more similar content
Actively engage your most loyal followers through mentions and responses
Experiment with alternative posting times
Consider collaborations with other creators or brands

good.general: Great job! Your engagement rate is above average. Your strategy is working well.
actions: Thoroughly analyze your best-performing content to replicate its success
Consider increasing posting frequency while maintaining quality
Leverage UGC (User Generated Content) to diversify content
Implement regular A/B testing for further optimization

excellent.general: Fantastic! Your engagement rate is among the best in the industry. Continue with this winning strategy.
actions: Document your current strategy to maintain consistency
Consider creating premium or exclusive content for your audience
Explore monetization opportunities such as brand partnerships
Share some of your expertise by creating meta-content about your success

default.general: We've calculated your engagement rate. Here are some general suggestions.
actions: Regularly monitor your engagement metrics
Actively respond to follower comments
Experiment with different types of content
Post consistently

platformSpecific.instagram: On Instagram, Reels get 22% more engagement than other formats. Integrate them into your strategy.
platformSpecific.facebook: On Facebook, video content gets 135% more organic reach than image-only posts.
platformSpecific.tiktok: On TikTok, using trending audio can increase engagement by up to 30%. Regularly monitor audio trends.
platformSpecific.linkedin: On LinkedIn, posts with original data and industry insights get 45% more engagement.
platformSpecific.twitter: On Twitter, tweets with video receive 10 times more engagement than those without media elements.
platformSpecific.default: Customize your strategy based on the unique characteristics of the platform.

results.consultationSubtext: Get a detailed analysis and custom strategy from our team
